author: Silas Lesnick
title: Inner City Movie: Colin Farrell Joins Denzel Washington
text:
January 31, 2017 SHARE Colin Farrell is in talks to join Denzel Washington in Dan Gilroy’s Inner City movie 
The upcoming Inner City movie appears to have added another star today as The Hollywood Reporter brings word that Colin Farrell is in talks to join Denzel Washington in the new project from Nightcrawler ’s Dan Gilroy. Inner City marks Gilroy’s second feature film as both writer and director. 
RELATED: Watch Denzel Washington and Chris Pratt in the New Magnificent Seven Trailer 
Inner City will follow Washington as a Los Angeles based legal researcher. Following the death of his mentor, the lawyer is approached by a ruthless law firm that wants his help. Colin Farrell will play the slick lawyer that recruits Washington’s character. 
Dan Gilroy earned himself an Academy Award nomination for his original Nightcrawler screenplay. Prior to sitting in the director’s chair on the 2014 thriller, Gilroy made a name for himself as a screenwriter, scripting films like Freejack , The Fall and The Bourne Legacy . 
RELATED: Interview: Nightcrawler Director Dan Gilroy Explores the Underbelly of L.A. 
Colin Farrell was recently seen in J.K. Rowling ‘s Wizarding World. He played the role of Graves in last year’s Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them . Other recent projects include the dark comedy The Lobster and the second season of HBO ‘s True Detective . He can be seen coming up in the latest from writer and director Sofia Coppola, The Beguiled . 
Jennifer Fox, who previously worked with Gilroy on Nightcrawler , will again serve as producer on the Inner City movie. Check back for further casting updates on the project as they become available. 
What do you think of the pairing of Denzel Washington and Colin Farrell? Does the plot for Inner City pique your interest? Let us know in the comments below!
